annotation_sentence: I like to go hiking. Many mountains in Hong Kong, very pretty.
rationale: The word 'Many' is a quantifier used to indicate a large number of mountains.

annotation_sentence: Yes, when I have time. Sometimes, uh, weekend.
rationale: The word 'Sometimes' is a quantifier indicating an indefinite frequency.
